articles.title: The Finals developers say they've found why movement speed feels slower, despite "no change" since beta - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: Players are reporting that movement in The Finals is slower than it was in the beta, despite the developers saying nothing has changed.
articles.content: The Finals surprised launched during The Game Awards on Thursday night and its popularity has picked up where last month's open beta left off. There has been some negative feedback, however, from pla… [+2323 chars]
